content:
<rule id="technology-usage-ejb-01000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <graph-query discriminator="EjbSessionBeanModel">
                    <property name="sessionType">Stateless</property>
                </graph-query>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-identified name="Stateless (SLSB)">
                    <tag name="Connect"/>
                    <tag name="Bean"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
